name: Curve25519.Signing
desc: A mechanism used to create or verify a cryptographic signature using Ed25519.

items.name: struct Curve25519.Signing.PrivateKey
items.desc: A Curve25519 private key used to create cryptographic signatures.

items.name: struct Curve25519.Signing.PublicKey
items.desc: A Curve25519 public key used to verify cryptographic signatures.
